text: Na ce musu, “Kada a buɗe ƙofofin Urushalima da sassafe sai rana ta fito sosai. Yayinda matsaran ƙofofi suna aiki, a kulle ƙofofin a sa musu sakata kafin matsaran su tashi, wajen fāɗuwar rana. Ku kuma naɗa mazaunan Urushalima a matsayin masu tsaro, waɗansunsu a wuraren aiki, waɗansun kuma kusa da gidajensu.”
